website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, windproof heated jacket that's suitable for cool weather but may not be quite up to par for winter wear.
pros: Jacket is lightweight yet constructed to resist water and wind
Has 3 heat settings, fleece lining, and foldable hood
cons: LED indicator is on the outside of the jacket which is not ideal

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Wore it this morning, nice and toasty. Jacket runs a little small. I am between a a 2x&3x. I got the 3x based on the measurements, it is snug around the gut, if you are a true 3x this will probably not fit. Jacket construction is solid and it seems like a quality product. Packaging was very professional and instructions were clear. Seller is awesome, a true professional who values customer satisfaction, it is not often I get a real email from a vendor, usually it is a standard form thanking you for your purchase, ITIEBO is a company I will use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T

customer_reviews.title: Double check sizing chart.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket just too a bit tight and it's nice you can charge a phone with the battery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Windproof and very warm.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this jacket.He likes that it is windproof and that the zipper extends to cover his neck and chin and even his mouth to help block out the cold and wind. The hood is snug and can be adjusted to fit a hat underneath. The heating element works well so far (he has had it 10 days). The only downside is the instructions were not written in clear English, but easy to figure out anyway. He would highly recommend this jacket. My husband is 70 and uses it to go running and long walks with his beloved dog in cold Michigan weather.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bright power light bad placement
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket and hood is great. LED power indicator should be on the inside of jacket. As it is now everybody can see the light which is invasive for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T.

customer_reviews.title: Battery did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the battery for this coat did not work. After charging the battery I plugged it into the coat but the battery showed three blue lights and would not change modes or turn off as the directions explained. I messaged the seller about replacing the battery but I never got a reply so I had to send the coat back.
customer_reviews.author: James Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Jacket did not heat up
customer_reviews.text: Jacket did not fully heat up. Charged battery for 24 hours, but still did not heat the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Grant

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jacket
customer_reviews.text: It’s food to order this jacket a little bit bigger mike came in the perfect size. The jacket only needs some breaking in to do use it and wear it and it gets better and better. I like the medium (blue) setting I use this for work I go in and out of freezers right the cold windy out side wet or snowing and this does WONDERS! Best headed jacket now doubt
customer_reviews.author: Shane Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket for the $, but get a larger size!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a nice jacket, but the sizing is an issue. I wear a Mens 2xl, but I had to order the XXXXL as other did. Other than that it works, and keeps me warm. Only time will tell it it last.
customer_reviews.author: JAKE

customer_reviews.title: Loves it but needs a spare battery for all day outside
customer_reviews.text: My son works outside a lot and this comes in handy and he loves it. For very long hours an extra battery helps. This last about 8 hours ish. You can get a spare for $39.99
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The size chart was accurate it fit just the way I like it more to come when it gets cold out Update was 20 degrees out yesterday and the jacket worked like a charm was just toasty on medium for my one hour morning walk love it
customer_reviews.author: urieal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubs as a Christmas gift. He's currently in Utah for work and the snow/cold temps there it really comes handy. He said, it's so nice and works really good! #score
customer_reviews.author: tina Robinson

customer_reviews.title: looks like will be nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait where this winter considering I have walk to work
customer_reviews.author: Carl D Clark

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this coat 2 sizes larger than usual and it fits just right
customer_reviews.author: Tarlos 49

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't reccomend for a few reasons. Limited heating space. Short battery time (dies when you don't immediately use it) and feels very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Evens

customer_reviews.title: Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews on this jacket . No one ever said the Zipper is on the left side when worn ! Opposite of anything I have ever owned ! Instructions leave things unclear . Pockets are high mabe for short armed people . Is nice warm jacket . I hope it continues to work for a while . What is the button on battery for ?
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Turner

customer_reviews.title: Truth
customer_reviews.text: It good I layer up so I order two sizes up
customer_reviews.author: KIimberly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered my husband a size up from what he normally wears and it seems to fit pretty good. So far he loves it!! Nice jacket with lots of pockets and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes bigger
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket just too tight for me. I wear a 2xl in most things. This jacket was tight in a 3xl. The zipper was also poor quality if it was looser I would have taken a chance on the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company has great customer service! Super nice and easy to work with! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kira Krivanek

customer_reviews.title: Great on a motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I ordered a size larger thanks to reviews that said it runs small. It fit perfect and was great to block the wind and keep him warm on his motorcycle ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was too Small ordered one size up (4X) from what I normal wear and it fit like a (2X) or (1XL). Seems like it's pretty nice quality but didn't get a chance to wear long term.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Battery is low quality. It took me 11 hours to charge and may 2 and 👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the battery. It goes out even though the 4 lights show its full.
customer_reviews.author: AG SAX

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for XXX-Large
customer_reviews.text: This was to be a XXX- Large, but it did not even fit my X-Large son. It was too small for him.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Erickson

customer_reviews.title: But overall the jacket was amazing while it was working Mabye I have a defective one who knows.
customer_reviews.text: Used the jacket a week for work and now the jacket cuts off on its own and flashes a baby blue light, also did not receive the battery advertised.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: The warming portion 9f this jacket is Amazing! I would recommend ordering a size up if you want thick clothes underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Payne

customer_reviews.title: Heated jacket
customer_reviews.text: You need to order one or two sizes bigger then you wear.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Heating element does not work in all 3 settings
customer_reviews.text: The heating element does not work properly. There are 3 different settings and the jacket only works on the medium setting.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Holop

customer_reviews.title: It feels as expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product my only problem is the hoodie how a attaches to the jacket, it heats up way fast!
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack is poor
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to get the battery pack to fully charge or to shut off without unplugging it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. Ordered a 4x it fit like a 2
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gunnoe

customer_reviews.title: Great....love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat. Keeps me nice a warm when I ski!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item to buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. Was packaged very well. Heats up nicely with three heat settings to choose from. Looks good with other than ordinary clothing. Was well priced and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Update: New coat is in the mail, replacement was painless and was handled directly by the company owner. Review changed to 5 stars for outstanding customer service. Worked great for part of last winter. It has since stopped working, after charging the batteries it worked for one day and now will not turn on, it is the same with both batteries. It has less than 4 months of use all together. Waiting for a reply from the seller about a replacement, will update soon one way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Get a little bigger than normal
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’5” and weight about 250 lbs, glad I read he other reviews. Normally I wear a2x but I ordered a 3x and love the fit. Seems to warm right up. Not sure of the battery charge from the factory. Will give it a full charge and go from there. It’s very windy and rainy here today and it completely stops the wind and rain both. 5-star so far
customer_reviews.author: Lonny M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up order one more. First jacket I ordered was xl my husband wear everything xl but this one was bit tight and little short. I recommend buy size one up. I let my stepdaughter try it out. She loved it. They were warm and looks very nice. Now both of them just wear them as regular day jacket. (I bought them for outdoor cold day jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Henning

customer_reviews.title: Good winter Jacket.
customer_reviews.text: This Winter Jacket could have been great if the size was true to fit. It runs very small, but works fantastic to keep you warm. This jacket just needs a slight tweaking in the fit development department, and it will be a 5 star winner.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is totally worth the price, its a good fit bit too long comes right to the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Rating
customer_reviews.text: I love the heating element of the jacket and keeps me very warm. I don’t like how they don’t have a universal plug to use other portable chargers for it because the one it comes with isn’t the best and has to be charged fully to work.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Many pockets in sleeves are a nice addition. Gets warm very quickly, even hot but the auto step-down is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in GR, MI

customer_reviews.title: Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. There was some issues with strings/stuffing coming out of pockets. But over all ok. Battery seems to die quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lensky

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who works outside and he loves this jacket wears it most days
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly u

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good fit.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He said it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D. H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loves it! Was a gift and they couldn’t be happier for the cold winters in Oregon
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, great quality...not so great on sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very straight forward 3x jacket wearer...this one fits like an XL. Gave it to my son so all is good...other than I'm looking for another jacket.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Tried contacting the company find nothing in United States to contact them even through looking them up online.Disappointed New battery was included with this purchase as it states that it is also the hood it’s not removable as it states that it is
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wohltmann

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket for the price. Heats perfectly and lasts for a nice period of time. Bought for my dad and he loves it when he has to be out in the snow and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler's Ice City

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jacket.It does zip the wrong way like a women's jacket Runs very small so order big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery shuts of and doesnt heat up
customer_reviews.text: The battery shuts of less than 1hr after fully charged and does not heat up appropriate not as expected
customer_reviews.author: ayman khatib

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this jacket but way too small. Got a 2xl and it looked like a child's size
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hoping it works out super. I bought them as Christmas gifts for my older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sweettea529

customer_reviews.title: Just minty jacket
customer_reviews.text: Coulda Ben a bit more true to its size but still works fantastic use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but warm
customer_reviews.text: This coat is light weight yet warm. Love the ample pockets and the battery has a USB charging port
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Aderhold

customer_reviews.title: Changes Heat Settings too quickly
customer_reviews.text: It changes to lower heat faster then I would like. Would be nice if it would stay on hottest setting longer
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Crosswhite

customer_reviews.title: Missing charger
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t come with a battery charger - where can I get one?
customer_reviews.author: Kerri L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept the directions are pathetic
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the directions I gave it to my sister's father-in-law
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gilreath

customer_reviews.title: Remember to charge your battery every 3 months when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the jacket for hunting. Kept my grandson who wore 1 also out longer with me too
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves are a little short
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves are a little short. Otherwise fits well. Hard to find an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: DeShanna Scarnecchia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy with the jacket when I got it last year but when I pulled it out this year the battery won’t charge its only a year old and for the price it should work for a few years not to happy
customer_reviews.author: Cody neumann

customer_reviews.title: Heated Winter Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great - I purchased it for my dad as a Christmas gift. He’s in his 80’s and always cold. It was a hit, fit was perfect and he loves the heat. He wears it every day and tells all his friends. He asked me to order one for his priest and so we did! 💕👍💕
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Super nice jacket. My boyfriend loves it. But I ordered a x large and was delivered a medium. Box even says x large Little frustrating, but trying to be understanding with the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: adriahnna

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact the company
customer_reviews.text: I would give a good review if there was proper way to contact the company and they fix my issue my coat was purchased as a gift from my wife for Christmas the coat will not stay on something is up with the button or a wire shorting not sure but i would like it fixex or replaced untell it happens my review is bad
customer_reviews.author: Travis  Lensky

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: As a sales rep always on the go, even during winter time! My husband loved this jack and how quickly it warms him up! He couldn’t believe it and all of his colleagues were asking about it! He definitely loved his Christmas present! It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Em Y

product_meta.title: ITIEBO Men's Heated Jacket Soft Shell with USB Battery Pack & Hoodies for Winter Outdoor Skiing Hiking
feature_bullets: WINTRE INDISPENSABLE PERFECT FOR MEN--The Men's Heated Jacket is made of 100% breathable wind-resistant and durable polyester and the lining is made of fleece fabric which ensures you a warm comfortable healthy winter

CE CERTIFIED BATTERY WARM YOUR WHOLE BODY-The winter heated apparel is powered by the large capacity 7.4V 5600mAh lithium Battery that plugged inside the bottom left pocket now can heat lasting up to 10 hrs on the lowest setting Your whole body would be kept warm by 3 intelligently integrated heating zones--left & right chest/mid-back

FOLDABLE HAT&OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES POWERFUI FUNCTION--The hood of ITIEBO Men's Heated Jacket is Foldable hat waterproof and wind-resistant which designed for windy autumn and chilly winter cold days It keeps you warm when you jugging and exercise in the morning It’s no radiation at all and can activate various functions of your skin and body boost metabolism improve blood circulation consume excessive heat perfectly suitable for Hiking Climbing Running Walking Riding Sport Camping

HOW TO WASH YOUR JACKET--The ITIEBO Men's Heated Technical Jacket is machine washable (Take out of the battery packet before washing) To add the durability and remain long service time of the heating elements you can use a mesh washing bag for washing the jacket

12 MONTHS WARRANTY& CUSTOMER SERVICE-- We are always sticking to the high-quality jackets and high-grade professional service We provide 1 year warranty after sale If anything happened to the products you bought please don’t hesitate to contact us Note As for the choice of size we have relevant instructions in the product description for guiding the user to choose according to combination of height and weight etc
